behavior slice_bread(bread:item, cutting_board:item, knife:item):
    body:
        achieve_once inhand(knife) # Safely hold the knife during the slicing
        achieve cut(bread) # Slice the bread

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind bread: item where:
            is_food_bread(bread)
        # Select an item that is identified as bread

        bind cutting_board: item where:
            is_cutting_board(cutting_board)
        # Select an item that is identified as a cutting board

        bind knife: item where:
            is_knife(knife)
        # Select an item that is identified as a knife

        achieve on(bread, cutting_board) # Ensure the bread is on the cutting board
        slice_bread(bread, cutting_board, knife) # Perform the slicing of the bread
